container.heading: Deposits on New Homes — Surety Bond or Escrow Account Requirements

annotations.annotation: Regulation .03B amended effective March 6, 1989 (16:4 Md. R. 496)
Chapter recodified from COMAR 09.30.04 to COMAR 31.16.02 effective September 7, 1998 (25:18 Md. R. 1439)

Chapter revised and recodified from 31.16.02 Surety Bond or Escrow Account Requirements to COMAR 09.01.11 Deposits on New Homes — Surety Bond and Escrow Account Requirements, as an emergency provision effective October 1, 1998 (25:22 Md. R. 1649); revised and recodified permanently effective December 28, 1998 (25:26 Md. R. 1920)
